sense.gloss: rival, opponent, adversary, competitor, enemy (esp. one with which there is longstanding enmity), foe
to return evil for good, to return a favour with spite (favor)

k_ele.e: 江戸の敵を長崎で討つ
江戸の仇を長崎で討つ
江戸のかたきを長崎で討つ

r_ele.r: えどのかたきをながさきでうつ

sense.gloss: to hit someone where they least expect it, to take revenge on someone in an unlikely place, to get revenge on someone in a different contest, to attack the Edo enemy in Nagasaki
deep rivers move in silence; shallow brooks are noisy, those who know little talk much
to backfire, to have a harmful result
to backfire, to have a harmful result
to avenge (someone) by striking down their killer
to harm, to injure, to damage
to hate the very sight of, to hold a grudge against, to treat like an enemy, to bear constant enmity, to be gunning for, to have it in for

x: 仇を討つ・あだをうつ

sense.gloss: to do (someone) a wrong, to do (someone) an ill turn, to take revenge
to resent, to bear a grudge
to do (someone) a wrong, to do (someone) an ill turn, to take revenge
to resent, to bear a grudge

r_ele.r: あだをおんでむくいる

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓は↑恩↑↓おん↓を↑仇↑↓きゅう↓で↑返↑↓かえ↓したな。
sdata.e: You bit the hand that fed you.

sdata.j: お↑互↑↓たが↓い↑仇↑↓きゅう↓↑同士↑↓どうし↓だ。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓らはおじを↑殺↑↓ころ↓して↑父↑↓ちち↓の↑仇↑↓きゅう↓を↑討↑↓う↓とうと↑決心↑↓けっしん↓した。
sdata.e: They determined to avenge their father's death on their uncle.

sdata.j: カーペットには↑埃↑↓ほこり↓を↑吸収↑↓きゅうしゅう↓するダストポケット↑効果↑↓こうか↓があり、↑埃↑↓ほこり↓の↑飛散↑↓ひさん↓を↑防↑↓ふせ↓ぐ↑特長↑↓とくちょう↓があるのだが、それが↑仇↑↓あだ↓になった↑結果↑↓けっか↓といえる。
sdata.e: Carpets have the effect of a dust pocket, with merit of sucking up dust and stopping it flying around, but you can say that effect backfires.

sdata.j: ↑誰↑↓だれ↓がカールの↑仇討↑↓あだう↓ちをする？
sdata.e: Who will avenge the death of Karl?

sdata.j: 「ロボットを↑愛↑↓あい↓さなくなれば、↑彼奴↑↓あいつ↓は、↑御前↑↓おまえ↓に↑復仇↑↓ふっきゅう↓する。」「あのロボットが——」「ああ。」「どんな↑復讐↑↓ふくしゅう↓？」「↑殺↑↓ころ↓す。」
sdata.e: If you stop loving the robot, it will take its revenge upon you "That robot will--" "Yes" " What type of revenge?" "It will kill you"

sdata.j: なんぢわが↑仇↑↓きゅう↓のまへに↑我↑↓わ↓がために↑筵↑↓むしろ↓をまうけ、わが↑首↑↓くび↓にあぶらをそゝぎたまふ。わが↑酒杯↑↓しゅはい↓はあふるゝなり。
sdata.e: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies; Thou hast anointed my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

sdata.j: ↑恩↑↓おん↓を↑仇↑↓あだ↓で↑返↑↓かえ↓すんじゃないぞ。
sdata.e: Never bite the hand that feeds you.

sdata.j: ↑恩↑↓おん↓を↑仇↑↓あだ↓で↑返↑↓かえ↓すな。
sdata.e: Never bite the hand that feeds you.

sdata.e: Don't act like my friend while stabbing me in the back.
